Meanwhile, Chevron is using our criminal justice system to retaliate against & silence environmental lawyers who stand up to their corruption & greed.

@SDonziger & I had a great conversation about how to hold them accountable & get justice for the communities they harmed.

I’m sick & tired of companies like @Chevron treating our planet like trash while campesino & Indigenous communities in Ecuador remain devastated for decades by the cancer-causing toxic chemicals they left behind. https://t.co/Wo7b6J9mJ5

Father Mike & his team are an inspiration—but we need to do better as a country. Most of the families they help are working, but still struggle to make ends meet. 

We need to learn from @hungrymonknyc to make sure that families get the dignity they deserve & the food they need. https://t.co/bckBthbc4K
Food insecurity was around before COVID—but @hungrymonknyc stepped up 3 years ago & their team continues to provide food & dignity to thousands of people per day in Ridgewood. https://t.co/ZfkJ4yH7fb

In 2014, he testified before @TLHumanRights on such challenges in Haiti. He made enduring contributions to the lives of countless people in Haiti, Rwanda & the world. I’ll always remember Paul & all he taught me. My thoughts are with his family & all those whose lives he touched.

I am devastated by the news that Paul Farmer unexpectedly passed away. I knew Paul & we met many times to discuss how to create development programs that expand the capacity of people to care for & advance their own communities & nations. https://t.co/XNcmgJbEwq

RT to say let's get this to President Biden's desk so our schools can focus on preparing America's students for the future with healthy, nutritious, delicious lunches!
https://t.co/1Az8dNvtmh

Every child in America should have a fresh, healthy lunch at school.

Yesterday in Orange, I announced the LUNCHES Act, my new bill to close the gap between the actual cost of making a school lunch & the amount schools get reimbursed.
https://t.co/YilUO5fW4H

I’m excited about the promise hydroponics have for helping to address our hunger crisis & look forward to partnering with Charles & his team to expand on their success!

Joe Biden says he'll nominate a black woman & suddenly there's outrage.

Let's just call it what it is: racism.

Harlee is a champion for women’s rights & reproductive justice—Roe v. Wade is codified into law in the Commonwealth b/c of her determination & persistence. She’s a consistent source of inspiration & wisdom to me & many others, including all the staff & students she's mentored.

Her advocacy has played a key role in Worcester’s renewal. Her determination to deliver for the communities she represents has brought incredible investments to Worcester County. And her leadership on Beacon Hill has made life better for the people of Massachusetts.

Senate President Emerita Harriette Chandler is one of the most tenacious, hardworking, effective public servants I know. The 1st woman ever elected to the @MA_Senate from Worcester & the 2nd ever to serve as Senate President, she is truly a trailblazer.

@jeffinmillbury Regardless of what you think of our objections to highlight interference in the election, we took 8 minutes & we moved on.

No weapons or zip ties. No smashed windows or gallows to hang anyone. No excrement smeared on the walls or police officers beaten.
@jeffinmillbury I'm sorry, but comparing those two things is offensive and preposterous. I wrote an entire oped about this on January 5th, 2021. https://t.co/6VhgXZHoUf

It's an honor to represent the people of the Second Congressional District of Massachusetts in Washington and to carry their diverse perspectives, beliefs, ideas and voices to the United States Congress. 4/4

At a time of unprecedented inequality and economic unfairness, BUILD BACK BETTER turns the page on four decades of failed trickle-down economics.

It invests in the backbone of our country: in our workers, in our middle class, and in everyone fighting hard to get there.

I have talked to so many of you who are sick and tired of working hard but falling behind.

All you want is a country and a Congress that looks out for your interests and puts your needs first. That is what BUILD BACK BETTER ACT does.

That work is bigger than a single president or plan.

Because today, all these years later, President Biden and Democrats are working to fulfill the promise of making life better for the American people by passing the BUILD BACK BETTER ACT.

It’s a bright day, America ☀️
